name: Sprint Intervals
description: Alternating high-intensity sprints with low-intensity recovery for endurance and fat loss.

cards.title: 30-Second Sprints with Active Recovery
cards.description: Pushing the anaerobic threshold through all-out sprint bursts.
bulletpoints: Recover with slow jogging or walking for 60 seconds
Maintain a tall posture and strong arm drive
cards.summaryText: Blast 30-second sprints then jog it off to sharpen anaerobic punch.

cards.title: Hill Repeats for Power and Endurance
cards.description: Using an incline to enhance strength and cardiovascular fitness.
bulletpoints: Walk or jog back down as recovery
cards.summaryText: Charge up hills with compact strides, reset on the descent, and repeat.
